sourceMeaningMnemonic: As the <radical>tsunami</radical> hits your <radical>scooter</radical> and your <radical>car</radical>, it alters the wave, creating <kanji>ripples</kanji>.
meaningInfo: They're hard to see because a tsunami is pretty big, but your scooter and car do create ripples in the water as it goes past.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Ripples</kanji> come off of your scooter and car from when they were hit by a tsunami. More importantly, those things were <reading>ren</reading>tals (<ja>れん</ja>), so ripples or not, it doesn't matter if they were hit by a tsunami.
readingInfo: As you watch the ripples come off your car / scooter, be sure to imagine the relief you'd feel if you knew they were rentals and not something owned by you.
